types.html:
saint-cyrien (feminine saint-cyrienne, masculine plural saint-cyriens, feminine plural saint-cyriennes)

  1. Of or relating to several French communes containing Saint-Cyr in their names:
    1. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr, in the department of Ardèche.
    2. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr, in the department of Manche.
    3. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr, in the department of Saône-et-Loire.
    4. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr, in the department of Vienne.
    5. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-de-Salerne, in the department of Eure.
    6. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-de-Valorges, in the department of Loire.
    7. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-des-Gâts, in the department of Vendée.
    8. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-du-Doret, in the department of Charente-Maritime.
    9. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-du-Gault, in the department of Loir-et-Cher.
    10. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-du-Ronceray, in the department of Calvados.
    11. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-en-Arthies, in the department of Val-d'Oise.
    12. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-en-Bourg, in the department of Maine-et-Loire.
    13. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-en-Talmondais, in the department of Vendée.
    14. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-en-Val, in the department of Loiret.
    15. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-la-Campagne, in the department of Eure.
    16. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-la-Lande, in the department of Deux-Sèvres.
    17. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-la-Rivière, in the department of Essonne.
    18. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-la-Roche, in the department of Corrèze.
    19. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-le-Chatoux, in the department of Rhône.
    20. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-le-Gravelais, in the department of Mayenne.
    21. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-les-Champagnes, in the department of Dordogne.
    22. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-les-Colons, in the department of Yonne.
    23. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-l'École, in the department of Yvelines.
    24. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-sous-Dourdan, in the department of Essonne.
    25. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-sur-Loire, in the department of Indre-et-Loire.
    26. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-sur-Menthon, in the department of Ain.
    27. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-sur-Mer, in the department of Var.
    28. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-sur-Morin, in the department of Seine-et-Marne.
    29. Of or relating to Saint-Cyr-sur-le-Rhône, in the department of Rhône.
  2. Of or relating to other French communes with similar sounding names:
    1. Of or relating to Saint-Ciers-d'Abzac, in the department of Gironde.
    2. Of or relating to Saint-Ciers-sur-Gironde, in the department of Gironde.
    3. Of or relating to Saint-Cirq-Madelon, in the department of Lot.
